mainTitle: Maamulka Elektarooniga ah iyo Ururinta Xogta Online-ka
mainParagraph: Maamulka Elektarooniga ah waxa uu la xiriiraa adeegsiga tignoolajiyada casriga ah si loo bixiyo adeegyada dadweynaha, kor loogu qaado isgaarsiinta dowladda iyo muwaadiniinta, loo hagaajiyo hufnaanta, lana kordhiyo waxqabadka dowladda.
keyComponentsTitle: Qaybaha Muhiimka ah ee Maamulka Elektarooniga:
keyComponentsParagraph: Maamulka elektarooniga ah waxa uu beddelayaa habka ay dowladuhu ula dhaqmaan muwaadiniinta, iyaga oo adeegsanaya tignoolajiyada si loo helo hufnaan iyo isla xisaabtan.

digitalPublicServices.title: E-Caafimaad
digitalPublicServices.description: Adeegyada caafimaadka ee dijitaalka ah sida telemedicine, diiwaannada caafimaadka elektarooniga, iyo bogagga xogta caafimaadka.

digitalPublicServices.title: E-Waxbarasho
digitalPublicServices.description: Khayraadka waxbarashada online-ka ah, fasallada dijitaalka ah, iyo barnaamijyada e-learning.

digitalPublicServices.title: E-Adeegyo
digitalPublicServices.description: Goobaha adeegyada dowladda ee internet-ka sida rukhsadaha, canshuuraha, iyo diiwaannada dadweynaha.

citizenEngagement.title: E-Ka-qaybgal
citizenEngagement.description: Qalabyo iyo madal online ah oo u suura geliya muwaadiniinta inay ka qayb qaataan go'aan qaadashada.

citizenEngagement.title: E-La-tashi
citizenEngagement.description: Sahanada internet-ka iyo doodaha dadweynaha ee la xiriira siyaasadda.

transparency.title: Xog Furan
transparency.description: Ololaha dawladda ee lagu bixinayo xogta dadweynaha si loo xoojiyo hufnaanta.

transparency.title: E-Kormeer
transparency.description: Hababka dijitaalka ah ee lagu hubiyo waxqabadka dawladda si looga hortago musuqmaasuqa.

efficiency.title: E-Qandaraas
efficiency.description: Hababka qandaraasyada online-ka ah si loo fududeeyo wax iibsiga.

efficiency.title: Habaynta Shaqada Dijitaalka ah
efficiency.description: Si otomaatig ah loo habeeyo hababka shaqo si loo yareeyo qaladaadka iyo kor loogu qaado waxqabadka.

security.title: Amniga Internet-ka
security.description: Tallaabooyinka lagu difaacayo kaabayaasha dijitaalka ah iyo xogta muwaadiniinta.

security.title: Ilaalinta Xogta
security.description: Xeerar lagu xaqiijinayo asturnaanta iyo amniga xogta.

benefits.title: Helitaan
benefits.description: Muwaadiniintu waxay heli karaan adeegyo wakhti kasta iyo meel kasta.

benefits.title: Waxtar
benefits.description: Adeegyada otomaatiga ah waxay yareeyaan wakhtiga iyo kharashka.

benefits.title: Hufnaan
benefits.description: Xog furan iyo kormeerka dijitaalka ah waxay xoojiyaan hufnaanta.

benefits.title: Ka-qaybgal
benefits.description: Qalabka e-participation wuxuu kor u qaadaa ka qaybgalka muwaadiniinta.

benefits.title: Badbaadinta Kharashka
benefits.description: Adeegyada dijitaalka ah waxay yareeyaan kharashaadka dowladeed.

onlineDataCollectionParagraph: Ururinta xogta online-ka waxay ku lug leedahay helista xogta isticmaalayaasha websaydhada, apps-ka mobilada, iyo baraha bulshada.
onlineDataCollection: Xogta Shaqsiga: Magacyada, iimaylada, xogta bixinta.
Xogta Dhaqanka: Bogagga la arkay, gujisyada, iyo wakhtiga fadhiga.
Xogta Macaamilka: Taariikhda iibsiga, faahfaahinta amarrada.
Xogta Cilmiga Dadweynaha: Da'da, jinsiga, goobta.
Xogta Farsamada: IP addresses, nooca browser-ka.
Xogta Doorbidida: Xiisaha iyo doorbidida isticmaalayaasha.
bestPractices: Hufnaan iyo Ogolaansho: U sheeg isticmaalayaasha hababka ururinta xogta.
Yaraynta Xogta: Ururi xogta loo baahan yahay oo kaliya.
Tallaabooyinka Amniga: Sugta xogta la ururiyay.
Xakameynta Isticmaalaha: Sii habab ay isticmaalayaashu ku maareeyaan xogtooda.
U-hoggaansanaanta: La soco xeerarka ilaalinta xogta.
Saxnaanta Xogta: Hubi xogta in ay cusboonaysantahay.
Anonymization: Ka ilaali xogta asturnaanta iyadoo la qarxinayo.
Siyaasadaha Qarsoodiga: Samee siyaasado cad oo la fahmi karo.
